## GAD-7 vs SURPS

GAD-7 vs SURPS Psychologists and researchers often find themselves in need of comparing and harmonising different questionnaires for efficient and productive study. Comparison between two prominent tools, the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Substance Use Risk Profile Scale (SURPS), often termed as GAD-7 vs SURPS, can be quite a task manually. While GAD-7 offers insights on generalised anxiety disorder, SURPS provides a deeper understanding of substance use risk. However, the manual process could be tedious and error-prone. Enter Harmony, an AI-powered tool developed specifically to assist psychologists in questionnaire harmonisation. The software uses natural language processing and generative AI models, ably handling varying languages, to analyse and compare items in both GAD-7 and SURPS. Harmony simplifies the process of comparing GAD-7 vs SURPS, offering percentage match between each item, a feature that can significantly expedite the research process and ensure accuracy. In essence, Harmony provides an opportunity for psychologists to leverage technology to save time and improve research outcomes. By automating the comparison between these two essential instruments (GAD-7 vs SURPS) through Harmony, researchers can focus more on their core studies and less on laborious manual data comparisons. Harmony's user-friendly web interface, which allows dragging and dropping of instrument PDFs, makes this data harmonisation process a breeze. It's time to change the way we compare GAD-7 and SURPS with Harmony.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and SURPS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and SURPS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SURPS into Harmony</a> - compare SURPS with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
